charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had heard rumors of
mysterious singing coming from a cave, and when
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] went there to investigate...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0301_0300_10: What were you doing just now?
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0302_0500_10: I thought you were a ghost
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0402_0600_10: Th-that’s what I thought YOU were!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_0700_10:
To tell you the truth...it’s my dream to sing with
Meloetta on stage someday.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_0800_10:
Maybe we could even go on to star in musical
movie together or something!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_0900_10:
That’s why I’ve been practicing singing with
Meloetta in empty places like this one.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_1000_10:
*sigh* And I was trying so hard not to let anyone
find me, too...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_1200_10:
Whaaa—?! There are rumors going around about
mysterious singing coming from this cave night
after night?
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_1300_10:
In that case, I’d probably better find a different
place to practice...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0301_1400_10: But you were singing so well!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0302_1600_10: Why not just let them hear you?
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_1800_10:
I’m still not as confident in my singing as I am in
my Pokémon battling...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_1900_10: No... I just can’t do it! I mean...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_2000_10:
don’t you think Meloetta has SUCH a beautiful
voice?
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_2100_10:
I’ve been swooning over it ever since we first met
back in Unova!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_2200_10:
Meloetta’s voice has the power to stir up the
emotions of people and Pokémon that hear it.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_2300_10: And, well...I just wish I could sing like that.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_2400_10:
So I’ve been trying to practice in secret until I
improve enough that I can move people like
Meloetta does.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_2600_10:
If I really want to be like Meloetta, maybe I should
just sing freely like it does without worrying about
other stuff.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0301_2700_10: I want to hear you sing more, Rosa!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0401_2800_10:
Heh heh... As long as you don’t mind that I’m still
just practicing!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0402_3000_10:
Ooh, I’d love to hear you
sing, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_3100_10:
I’m starting to feel like I can sing more freely and
have more fun with it!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_3200_10: And, well...if it’s not too much trouble...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_3300_10:
I’d be really happy if you practiced singing with
me too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0401_3500_10:
W-wow, you’re really raring to go! Thanks
so much!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_0402_3700_10: Hee hee! I’m gonna hold you to that!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_3800_10:
Oh, but before we practice singing, I have another
favor to ask...
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_3900_10:
Meloetta and I also make a great team for
Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_4000_10:
So I’d love it if you could be my opponent for
that, too.
charaepi_ch0101_90_mei/2301_1201_4100_10:
We’re gonna come at you with all we’ve got, so
be ready for it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
